mapper.select: select decode(grouping(ageLine), 0, to_char(ageLine), '전체') as ageLine , count(ageLine) as cnt , round(count(ageLine) / (select count(*) from tbl_reviewVisitor) * 100) as percent from ( select trunc(extract(year from sysdate) - (to_number(substr(B.birthday,1,2)) + case when substr(B.birthday,1,1) in('0','1') then 2000 else 1900 end ) + 1,-1) as ageline from tbl_review A join tbl_reviewVisitor B on A.reviewseq = B.reviewseq where A.restseq = #{restSeq} )V group by rollup(ageline)

select decode(grouping(gender), 0, to_char(gender), '전체') as gender , count(gender) as cnt , round(count(gender) * 100 / (select count(*) from tbl_review where restseq = #{restseq}) ) as percent from ( select B.gender from tbl_review A join tbl_reviewVisitor B on A.reviewseq = B.reviewseq where A.restseq = #{restseq} )V group by rollup(gender)

select rno, commentSeq, content, agoDay, agoHour, agoMinute, commentCount, groupNo, fk_seq, depthNo, userName, userProfile from ( select rownum as rno, a.commentSeq, a.content, trunc((sysdate - a.regDate), 0) as agoDay, trunc((sysdate - a.regDate) * 1 * 24, 0) as agoHour, trunc((sysdate - a.regDate) * 1 * 24 * 60,0) as agoMinute, a.commentCount, a.groupNo, a.fk_seq, a.depthNo, b.userName, b.userProfile from tbl_review_comment a join tbl_user b on a.userSeq = b.userSeq where reviewSeq = #{reviewSeq} and depthno = 0 and status = 1 start with fk_seq = 0 connect by prior a.commentseq = a.fk_seq order siblings by a.groupno asc, a.commentseq asc )where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}
